name: Glitched Cat Apocalypse
description:
[NOT MOBILE FRIENDLY] [WIP]

 Story:  

 Oh no! One of your friends was corrupted by the glitch virus and is very aggressive! Use the arrow keys to maneuver yourself away from this monster and the spacebar to shoot it as the glitch sea grows bigger and harder to move around through! 

 Music: Escape Chase - Fesliyan Studios

 Recommended play: PC   

Click this to go to the original game
